verses.name: Leviticus 4:28
verses.text: Or if his sin, which he hath sinned, come to his knowledge: then he shall bring his offering, a kid of the goats, a female without blemish, for his sin which he hath sinned.

verses.name: Leviticus 4:29
verses.text: And he shall lay his hand upon the head of the sin offering, and slay the sin offering in the place of the burnt offering.

verses.name: Leviticus 4:30
verses.text: And the priest shall take of the blood thereof with his finger, and put it upon the horns of the altar of burnt offering, and shall pour out all the blood thereof at the bottom of the altar.
